Caption: The dignitaries stand for the invocation at the beginning of the event conducted to unveil the portrait of Prof. B. Sengupto (First Director of IIT Madras)
Event: Unveiling of the Portrait of Prof Sengupto
Description: A special event was held at the Instituteâ€™s Open Air Theatre in honour of Prof. B. Sengupto, the first Director of IIT Madras. The event consisted of a life size portrait (of the former director) unveiling and a series of speeches given by the dignitaries who were present at the event. The chief guest for the event was Prof. Maneklal Sankalchand Thacker, the director general of the Council of Scientific and Industrial Research. In the image, the dignitaries stand for the invocation at the beginning of the even. Standing from left: Prof. R. K. Gupta (HOD, Humanities and Social Sciences), an individual who is yet to be identified (possibly the portrait artist) Prof. M. S. Thacker (Director General, CSIR), Dr. A. L. Mudaliar (Chairman, Board of Governors), Prof. A. Ramachandran (Director), Prof. S. Sampath (Deputy Director)
